What the fuck leechers!? SHARE!

People complaining about lack of seeding and leechers need to realize that for North Americans anyway we really can't afford to seed much after getting a full copy of the download.  That's because in North America (and especially in Canada) the ISP's have imposed ridiculous bandwidth 'caps' which make it prohibitively expensive to download and upload movies.  They do that on purpose because here in Canada anyway the same companies that provide internet service also provide cable and satellite television programming that REALLY REALLY sucks and they are trying to prevent people from using the internet for downloading and streaming entertainment thus cutting off the revenue streams for their shitty television offerings.  So when you get people on here that don't seed back at least 1:1 that is what's happening.  Some of these plans have caps of only 60GB per month and then they charge $1-$2 per gigabyte transferred after that!!  So that means a download like this you could do only twice with a 1:1 ratio and then you're done with your cap for the entire month.  Hopefully that adds some kind of perspective to the behaviors you're seeing.
